content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Updated)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generation system at x=-25.0 y=80.5
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at x=-21.5 y=70.5 (connected to boiler)
- Boiler at x=-25.0 y=80.5 (connected to pump and steam engine)
- Steam engine at x=-25.5 y=89.5 (connected to boiler)
- Pipe network connecting all components (steam pipes now operational)

### Iron mining operation at x=15.5 y=70.5
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill at x=15.5 y=70.5 (now working)
- Stone furnace at x=16.0 y=74.0
- Burner inserter at x=16.5 y=72.5 (connecting drill and furnace)
- Wooden chest at x=16.5 y=75.5 (output storage)

### Copper mining operation at x=-46.5 y=70.5
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill at x=-46.5 y=70.5 (output blocked)
- Stone furnace at x=-46.0 y=74.0
- Burner inserter at x=-47.5 y=72.5 (connecting drill and furnace)
- Wooden chest at x=-45.5 y=75.5 (output storage)

## ERROR TIPS

### Entity placement errors
- Verify position is clear before placing entities (repeated chest placement attempts at occupied positions)
- Check for obstructions when placing inserters (multiple inserter placement attempts blocked by existing entities)
- Move closer before placing distant entities (pipe placement failed due to distance)

### Power system issues
- Add coal to boilers to generate steam (boiler still not fueled despite operational status)
- Ensure proper pipe connections between boiler and steam engine (connection issues persist)

### Production chain problems
- Connect mining drill outputs properly (copper drill still shows "waiting for space" warning)
- Verify chest positions before inventory inspection (attempt to check non-existent chest)
- Ensure inserters have proper positioning (burner inserters placement difficulties)

### Inventory management
- Check entity existence before inventory operations (multiple attempts with missing chests)
- Verify storage container positions before use

### Distance-related errors
- Move within placement range before attempting to build (pipe placement failed due to distance)
- Check maximum placement distance when building remotely

### Connection issues
- Verify fluid connections are properly aligned (steam system connection problems)
- Ensure all components in production chain are properly linked (output blocked warnings persist)
